name: Count and Add
description:
Count and Add is a title in a series of educational games from Scetlander, dedicated to children aged 5 to 12 years. With the help of Shades the Dog as the host, they learn how to count object and add them together.

There are five different mini-games available: "Sets 1" (inputting the number of objects on-screen), "Sets 2" (inputting the number of objects to appear), "Animals" (counting scattered objects), "Train" (count two sets of objects and add them together) and "Spider" (Complete addition equations before the spider reaches the butterfly) as well as "Clock and Calendar" mode (which just displays the internal clock and calendar in analogue or digital form).
